body: Boating Businesses       A commercial use-authorization from the park is required to offer boating services in Yellowstone National Park. The businesses listed below are authorized to offer boating services in Yellowstone.      Motorized Boating D Dornan's Snake River Angler — (307) 733-3699 F Far and Away Adventures — (208) 726-8888 Fish the Fly Guide Service and Travel — (307) 690-1139 G Grand Fishing Adventures J Jackson Hole Anglers — (307) 690-5717 Jackson Hole Fly Fishing School, LLC — (307) 699-3440 JD High Country Outfitters — (307) 733-3270 T Teton Troutfitters Triangle X Ranch — (307) 733-2183 Turpin Meadow Ranch — (307) 543-2000 Non-Motorized Boating G Geyser Kayak Yellowstone LLC — (307) 413-6177 Grand Teton Flyfishing — (307) 690-0910 J Jackson Hole Kayak School — (307) 733-2471 L Lost River Outfitters — (208) 726-1706 M Matthews Expeditions — (406) 223-5134 O OARS West, Inc. — (209) 736-4677 R Rendezvous River Sports & Jackson Hole Kayak School — (307) 733-2471 S Shurr Adventures, Inc. — (239) 300-3004 Sun Valley Trekking Company — (208) 788-1966 T Three Rivers Ranch — (208) 652-3750 TRR Outfitters — (800) 360-9051 W Wilderness Inquiry — (612) 676-9400 or (800) 728-0719 Wilderness Ventures — (307) 733-2122 or 800-533-2281 World Cast Anglers, LTD — (307) 733-6934 or (800) 654-0676 X Xanterra Parks & Resorts — (866) 439-7375
title: Yellowstone National Park: Boating Services
